title: NEAR Intents | Insights

text-H-d1.title: Brief Explanation of NEAR Intents
text-H-d1.html:
NEAR Intents is a revolutionary transaction framework that bridges AI and blockchain technology, allowing users and AI agents to execute complex transactions across multiple blockchains seamlessly. Launched in beta in November 2024, it simplifies the traditionally complex DeFi experience by letting users express what they want to accomplish, while the system figures out how to execute it efficiently. Learn more at https://near.org/intents.

Please note, bridged tokens are regularly minting under new slugs and there may not be an immediate mapping available to the accepted token contract. Thus, any aggregate amount in USD may be missing tokens for which there is not a price. Please refer directly to the table NEAR.DEFI.EZ_INTENTS or FACT_INTENTS for raw data.

text-YxFH.title: Cross-Chain Interactions Explained
text-YxFH.html:
What Are Intents?
Intents represent a user's desired outcome rather than the specific steps to achieve it. Instead of manually navigating different chains and protocols, users simply declare what they want to accomplish - like trading one asset for another.

How It Works
NEAR Intents operates through:

  • A decentralized network of "solvers" that find the best way to execute transactions

  • Chain abstraction technology that eliminates the need for traditional bridges

  • An intent-based model that sources liquidity from multiple sources (DeFi, CeFi, and off-chain)

Key Features
The system enables seamless trading of any asset across any blockchain through:

  • Unified liquidity access across all chains

  • No requirement for bridging or wrapping assets

  • Support for both simple swaps and complex DeFi operations

  • Integration with AI agents for automated trading and optimization

This architecture allows for better pricing and reduced risks compared to traditional cross-chain solutions, while maintaining security and reliability. The platform supports not just token transfers, but also account-level operations, including the management of various digital assets like NFTs and Soulbound Tokens

root-header.dashboardDescription: Track NEAR Intents activity across multiple blockchains, visualizing transaction volumes and cross-chain interactions.

text-H-d1.title: Brief Explanation of NEAR Intents
text-H-d1.html:
NEAR Intents is a revolutionary transaction framework that bridges AI and blockchain technology, allowing users and AI agents to execute complex transactions across multiple blockchains seamlessly. Launched in beta in November 2024, it simplifies the traditionally complex DeFi experience by letting users express what they want to accomplish, while the system figures out how to execute it efficiently. Learn more at https://near.org/intents.

Please note, bridged tokens are regularly minting under new slugs and there may not be an immediate mapping available to the accepted token contract. Thus, any aggregate amount in USD may be missing tokens for which there is not a price. Please refer directly to the table NEAR.DEFI.EZ_INTENTS or FACT_INTENTS for raw data.

text-YxFH.html:
What Are Intents?
Intents represent a user's desired outcome rather than the specific steps to achieve it. Instead of manually navigating different chains and protocols, users simply declare what they want to accomplish - like trading one asset for another.

How It Works

  • A decentralized network of "solvers" that find the best way to execute transactions

root-header.dashboardDescription: Track NEAR Intents activity across multiple blockchains, visualizing transaction volumes and cross-chain interactions.

description: Track NEAR Intents activity across multiple blockchains, visualizing transaction volumes and cross-chain interactions.

queries.name: Daily Intents I
queries.statement:
with dip4_logs as (
  select
    block_timestamp,
    tx_hash,
    receipt_id,
    predecessor_id,
    signer_id,
    receiver_id,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :account_id :: string,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :account_id :: string
    ) as participant_address,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :diff :: VARIANT,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :diff :: VARIANT
  ) as token_diff
  from
    near.core.fact_logs
  where
    receiver_id = 'intents.near'
    and block_timestamp >= '2024-11-01'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :standard :: STRING = 'dip4'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :event :: STRING = 'token_diff'
),
count_agg as (
select
  date_trunc('day', block_timestamp) :: date as date,
  count(distinct tx_hash) as tx_ct,
  count(distinct receipt_id) as receipt_ct,
  count(distinct participant_address) as participants_ct
from
  dip4_logs
group by
  1
)
select
  date,
  tx_ct,
  -- Cumulative Counts
  sum(tx_ct) over (order by date) as tx_ct_cum,
  receipt_ct,
  sum(receipt_ct) over (order by date) as receipt_ct_cum,
  participants_ct,
  sum(participants_ct) over (order by date) as participants_ct_cum,
  -- 7-Day Moving Averages
  avg(tx_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as tx_ct_ma7,
  avg(receipt_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as receipt_ct_ma7,
  avg(participants_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as participants_ct_ma7
from count_agg
order by 1

queries.name: ⭐️ [parent Query] NEP245 - (TVL Segmentation) Token Mint Volume by Chain & Token
queries.statement:
-- forked from NEP245 - Net Chain Volume, over time @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/b93dd1a6-4386-4c6c-80dc-be2ae64d4765
-- Updated 20250404 to use the EZ table instead

with source_data AS (
  SELECT
    *
  from
    near.defi.ez_intents
  where log_event in ('mt_mint', 'mt_burn')
)
select
  symbol,
  blockchain,
  sum(iff(log_event = 'mt_mint', zeroifnull(amount_usd), -zeroifnull(amount_usd))) as gross_amount_usd,
  sum(iff(log_event = 'mt_mint', amount_adj, -amount_adj)) as gross_token_amount
from
  source_data
group by
  1,
  2
having
  gross_amount_usd > 0
order by
  1,
  2

queries.name: NEP245 - Transfer Volume
queries.statement:
-- forked from NEP245 - Net Chain Mint Volume, over time @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/b93dd1a6-4386-4c6c-80dc-be2ae64d4765
with source_data AS (
  SELECT
    *
  from
    near.defi.ez_intents
  where
    log_event = 'mt_transfer'
  
  -- there are multiple transfers per receipt as the intent is solved
  qualify(row_number() over (partition by receipt_id order by block_id desc, amount_usd is not null desc) = 1)
)
select
  date_trunc('day', block_timestamp) as _date,
  blockchain,
  sum(zeroifnull(amount_usd)) as gross_amount_usd
from
  source_data
group by
  1,
  2
order by
  1,
  2

queries.name: NEP245 - Count Metrics
queries.statement:
with source_data as (
  select
    *
  from
  near.defi.ez_intents
),
metrics as (
  select
    count(distinct tx_hash) as tx_ct,
    count(distinct blockchain) as blockchain_ct,
    count(distinct token_id) as token_ct,
    count(distinct receipt_id) as receipt_ct
  from
    source_data
),
user_ct as (
  select
    count(distinct account_id) as account_ct
  from
    (
      select
        distinct owner_id as account_id
      from
        source_data
      union
      select
        distinct old_owner_id as account_id
      from
        source_data
      union
      select
        distinct new_owner_id as account_id
      from
        source_data
    )
)
select
  tx_ct,
  receipt_ct,
  blockchain_ct,
  token_ct,
  account_ct
from
  metrics
  left join user_ct on 1 = 1

queries.name: Weekly Intents
queries.statement:
with dip4_logs as (
  select
    block_timestamp,
    tx_hash,
    receipt_id,
    predecessor_id,
    signer_id,
    receiver_id,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :account_id :: string,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :account_id :: string
    ) as participant_address,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :diff :: VARIANT,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :diff :: VARIANT
  ) as token_diff
  from
    near.core.fact_logs
  where
    receiver_id = 'intents.near'
    and block_timestamp >= '2024-11-01'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :standard :: STRING = 'dip4'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :event :: STRING = 'token_diff'
),
count_agg as (
select
  date_trunc('week', block_timestamp) :: date as date,
  count(distinct tx_hash) as tx_ct,
  count(distinct receipt_id) as receipt_ct,
  count(distinct participant_address) as participants_ct
from
  dip4_logs
group by
  1
)
select
  date,
  tx_ct,
  -- Cumulative Counts
  sum(tx_ct) over (order by date) as tx_ct_cum,
  receipt_ct,
  sum(receipt_ct) over (order by date) as receipt_ct_cum,
  participants_ct,
  sum(participants_ct) over (order by date) as participants_ct_cum,
  -- 7-Day Moving Averages
  avg(tx_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as tx_ct_ma7,
  avg(receipt_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as receipt_ct_ma7,
  avg(participants_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as participants_ct_ma7
from count_agg
order by 1

queries.name: NEP245 -  (TVL by token) Net Mints by token
queries.statement:
with source_data AS (
  select
    block_timestamp,
    log_event,
    memo,
    amount_raw,
    amount_adj,
    amount_usd,
    blockchain,
    contract_address AS token_address,
    symbol,
    decimals,
    iff(
      log_event = 'mt_mint',
      amount_raw,
      - amount_raw
    ) as net_amount_unadj,
    iff(
      log_event = 'mt_mint',
      amount_usd,
      - amount_usd
    ) as net_amount_usd
  from
    near.defi.ez_intents
  where log_event in ('mt_mint', 'mt_burn')
),
net_bal AS (
  SELECT
    token_address,
    symbol,
    sum(net_amount_unadj) as net_tokens_minted_unadj,
    sum(net_amount_usd) as net_tokens_minted_usd,
    max(block_timestamp) as last_event
  from
    source_data
  group by
    1,2
)
select
  A.token_address AS token,
  symbol,
  net_tokens_minted_unadj,
  last_event,
  net_tokens_minted_usd
from
  net_bal A
order by net_tokens_minted_usd desc

queries.name: Monthly Volume
queries.statement:
-- forked from NEP245 - Net Chain Mint Volume, over time @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/b93dd1a6-4386-4c6c-80dc-be2ae64d4765
with source_data AS (
  SELECT
    *
  from
    near.defi.ez_intents
  where
    log_event = 'mt_transfer'
  
  -- there are multiple transfers per receipt as the intent is solved
  qualify(row_number() over (partition by receipt_id order by block_id desc, amount_usd is not null desc) = 1)
)
select
  date_trunc('month', block_timestamp) as _date,
  sum(zeroifnull(amount_usd)) as gross_amount_usd
from
  source_data
group by
  1
order by
  1

queries.name: NEP245 - (TVL) Total Net Mint Volume (non-Near)
queries.statement:
-- forked from NEP245 - Gross Net Mint Volume @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/bb4f5323-4c99-4406-8d9f-8075d0ec128d

select
  sum(zeroifnull(gross_amount_usd)) as total_net_minted_volume
from
  $query('2a36bf79-1b03-45eb-8acb-04eac6fdd4b0') 
where lower(blockchain) != 'near'

queries.name: NEP245 - Transfer Volume by REFERRER
queries.statement:
-- forked from NEP245 - Transfer Volume @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/4ba04785-fef5-4c5c-8093-ec0533664679

-- forked from NEP245 - Net Chain Mint Volume, over time @ https://flipsidecrypto.xyz/studio/queries/b93dd1a6-4386-4c6c-80dc-be2ae64d4765
with source_data AS (
  SELECT
    *
  from
    near.defi.ez_intents
  where
    log_event = 'mt_transfer'
  and
    referral is not null
  
  -- there are multiple transfers per receipt as the intent is solved
  qualify(row_number() over (partition by receipt_id order by block_id desc, amount_usd is not null desc) = 1)
)
select
  date_trunc('day', block_timestamp) as _date,
  referral,
  sum(zeroifnull(amount_usd)) as gross_amount_usd
from
  source_data
group by
  1,
  2
order by
  1,
  3 desc

queries.name: Monthly Intents
queries.statement:
with dip4_logs as (
  select
    block_timestamp,
    tx_hash,
    receipt_id,
    predecessor_id,
    signer_id,
    receiver_id,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :account_id :: string,

    coalesce(

  where
    receiver_id = 'intents.near'
    and block_timestamp >= '2024-11-01'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :standard :: STRING = 'dip4'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :event :: STRING = 'token_diff'
),
count_agg as (
select
  date_trunc('month', block_timestamp) :: date as date,
  count(distinct tx_hash) as tx_ct,
  count(distinct receipt_id) as receipt_ct,
  count(distinct participant_address) as participants_ct
from
  dip4_logs
group by
  1
)
select
  date,
  tx_ct,
  -- Cumulative Counts
  sum(tx_ct) over (order by date) as tx_ct_cum,
  receipt_ct,
  sum(receipt_ct) over (order by date) as receipt_ct_cum,
  participants_ct,
  sum(participants_ct) over (order by date) as participants_ct_cum,
  -- 7-Day Moving Averages
  avg(tx_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as tx_ct_ma7,
  avg(receipt_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as receipt_ct_ma7,
  avg(participants_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as participants_ct_ma7
from count_agg
order by 1

queries.name: Intent Users - top wallets by USD
queries.statement:
with 
nep245_source_data AS (
select * from
  near.defi.ez_intents
where receipt_succeeded
),
dip4_source_data AS (
select 
  receipt_id,
  account_id
from $query('18c98585-fac8-402a-849d-c61e5748cbf8')
where receipt_succeeded
),
join_signer as (
select
  dip4.account_id as intent_signer,
  nep245.*
from nep245_source_data nep245
left join dip4_source_data dip4 on dip4.receipt_id = nep245.receipt_id
where log_event = 'mt_transfer'
  and dip4.account_id is not null
qualify(row_number() over (partition by nep245.receipt_id order by log_index desc, amount_usd is not null desc) = 1)
)
select
  intent_signer,
  sum(zeroifnull(amount_usd)) as gross_transfer_volume
from join_signer
group by 1
order by 2 DESC

queries.name: DIP4 Logs - token_diff Count Metrics
queries.statement:
with dip4_logs as (
  select
    block_timestamp,
    tx_hash,
    receipt_id,
    predecessor_id,
    signer_id,
    receiver_id,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :account_id :: string,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :account_id :: string
    ) as participant_address,
    coalesce(
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data[0] :diff :: VARIANT,
      try_parse_json(clean_log) :data :diff :: VARIANT
  ) as token_diff
  from
    near.core.fact_logs
  where
    receiver_id = 'intents.near'
    and block_timestamp >= '2024-11-01'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :standard :: STRING = 'dip4'
    and try_parse_json(clean_log) :event :: STRING = 'token_diff'
),
count_agg as (
select
  date_trunc('day', block_timestamp) :: date as date,
  count(distinct tx_hash) as tx_ct,
  count(distinct receipt_id) as receipt_ct,
  count(distinct participant_address) as participants_ct
from
  dip4_logs
group by
  1
)
select
  date,
  tx_ct,
  -- Cumulative Counts
  sum(tx_ct) over (order by date) as tx_ct_cum,
  receipt_ct,
  sum(receipt_ct) over (order by date) as receipt_ct_cum,
  participants_ct,
  sum(participants_ct) over (order by date) as participants_ct_cum,
  -- 7-Day Moving Averages
  avg(tx_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as tx_ct_ma7,
  avg(receipt_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as receipt_ct_ma7,
  avg(participants_ct) over (
    order by date
    rows between 6 preceding and current row
  ) as participants_ct_ma7
from count_agg
order by 1
